Name: Reborn Souls
About the game: PRESENTATION: This is a classic 2D retro RPG in the vein of Skyfall, Ashes of Immortality and Last Heroes. FEATURES: Rich and well developed world and lore Unique characters each with their point of views and motivations, making for an intricate plot Over 10 hours of gameplay Sidequests to complete Quest Journal to track your progress Full Mouse Support SUMMARY: The Ecclesia is a Holy Order who follows the Grace of the Gods, under their command and through their teachings they are appeasing barbarian colonies and bringing peace to the continent, or so they say... As a Maiden of the Ecclesia, Sabrina, a young and brave woman is in charge of special assignments, in lands where dark magic, urban legends and folkore are all real, her job is not an easy one. While investigating a new incident in one of the appeased villages, she will learn much more than she bargained for... PLAY MORE GREAT GAMES / / /
